data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 3, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca.
Dimitrios Siovas (Huesca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Granada have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Granada's area.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Granada throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 11, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Huesca.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 13, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
In the minute 21, Huesca have a dangerous throw-in.
Huesca move into a 0-1 lead through a Mikel Rico header.
That's a fine assist from Sandro Ramirez.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Huesca close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Granada in Granada.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 26, Granada's Darwin Machis gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Huesca defender.
Granada are coming forward and Darwin Machis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 28, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 30, Sandro Ramirez for Huesca drives towards goal at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rafa Mir (Huesca) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dimitri Foulquier for Granada has been booked by Javier Alberola Rojas and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 34, Rafa Mir (Huesca) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 37, Huesca's Dimitrios Siovas misses with an attempt on goal.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Granada a goal kick.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Granada needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Luis Suarez gets an equalizer for Granada. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 43, Antonio Puertas instrumental with a fine assist.
Huesca have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
In the minute 46, Yangel Herrera is on a sub for Yan Eteki for Granada.
The home team have replaced Antonio Puertas with Roberto Soldado. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Martinez.
In the minute 47, Granada to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Goal! Borja Garcia gives Huesca a 1-2 lead in Granada.
David Ferreiro with an assist there.
In the minute 50, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Huesca.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Corner awarded to Granada.
Maxime Gonalons (Granada) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Luis Suarez (Granada) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Huesca defence as Luis Suarez fires in a strike for Granada.
In the minute 55, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Sandro Ramirez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Huesca.
Granada drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 56, Granada are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
German Sanchez (Granada) has received a yellow card from Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Granada.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 57, In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Granada.
In Granada, Roberto Soldado (Granada) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 59, Javier Alberola Rojas awards Huesca a goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Michel is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes with Shinji Okazaki replacing Rafa Mir.
Idrissa Doumbia is replacing Mikel Rico for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Granada in the half of Huesca.
Darwin Machis (Granada) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 66, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Huesca.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Granada make their third substitution with Robert Kenedy replacing Luis Milla.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Huesca have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Michel (Huesca) is making a third substitution, with Javier Ontiveros replacing Sandro Ramirez.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
In Granada, Darwin Machis (Granada) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Granada.
In the minute 77, Granada to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Quini is replacing Dimitri Foulquier for the home team.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Carlos Neva with Jorge Molina.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Throw-in for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 80, Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 82, Goal! Shinji Okazaki extends Huesca's lead to 1-3.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada.
Free kick Granada.
In the minute 84, Huesca push upfield but Javier Alberola Rojas quickly pulls them for offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
The away team replace Borja Garcia with Dani Escriche.
In the minute 86, Juan Carlos is replacing David Ferreiro for Huesca at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 88, Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 2-3. Jorge Molina got above everyone else to nod it in.
Great play from Darwin Machis to set up the goal.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Granada close to the penalty box.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Granada's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Javier Alberola Rojas blows to end the match. The final score is 3-3.
German Sanchez (Granada) levels the match at 3-3 with a header.
Great play from Robert Kenedy to set up the goal.
